translations: n.否定的回答；反对（用于投票）

sentences.sentence: Long essays, nay, whole books have been written on this.
sentences.translation: 许多长篇文章，不，应该是许多整本的书都是关于这件事的。

sentences.sentence: The board wants input from members before they all vote yea or nay.
sentences.translation: 在成员全部投赞成票或否决票之前，董事会希望听到他们的意见。

sentences.sentence: Nay, I have nothing to do there!
sentences.translation: 不，我没有什么事要去那儿做！
